metadata.title: CVE-2024-32867 on Ubuntu 22.04 LTS (jammy) - medium
metadata.description: Suricata is a network Intrusion Detection System, Intrusion PreventionSystem and Network Security Monitoring engine. Prior to 7.0.5 and 6.0.19,various problems in handling of fragmentation anomalies can lead tomis-detection of rules and policy. This vulnerability is fixed in 7.0.5 or6.0.19.

criterions.comment: suricata package in jammy is affected and may need fixing.
